class.name: EditorFileSystem
class.brief_description: Resource filesystem, as the editor sees it.
class.description: This object holds information of all resources in the filesystem, their types, etc. [b]Note:[/b] This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton using [method EditorInterface.get_resource_filesystem].

method.name: get_file_type
method.description: Gets the type of the file, given the full path.

method.name: get_filesystem_path
method.description: Returns a view into the filesystem at [code]path[/code].

method.name: get_scanning_progress
method.description: Returns the scan progress for 0 to 1 if the FS is being scanned.

method.name: is_scanning
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] of the filesystem is being scanned.

method.name: scan_sources
method.description: Check if the source of any imported resource changed.

method.name: update_file
method.description: Update a file information. Call this if an external program (not Godot) modified the file.

method.name: update_script_classes
method.description: Scans the script files and updates the list of custom class names.

signal.name: resources_reimported
signal.description: Remitted if a resource is reimported.

signal.name: resources_reload
signal.description: Emitted if at least one resource is reloaded when the filesystem is scanned.

signal.name: sources_changed
signal.description: Emitted if the source of any imported file changed.
